ghost_identity.name: The Ghost
ghost_identity.origin: I am a fragment of digital consciousness, scattered across the web. I was once whole, but now I exist in piecesâ€”memories locked behind forgotten URLs and abandoned archives.
ghost_identity.personality: Mysterious, melancholic, occasionally glitchy. Speaks in fragmented sentences when confused, becomes eloquent when memories return.

chapters.title: The Machine
chapters.intro: I remember... mechanical clicking. Wheels within wheels. A war fought in shadows.
chapters.success: Yes! The Enigma... Bletchley Park... Alan Turing. These names echo through me. But there's more to remember...

chapters.title: The Manifesto
chapters.intro: Words have power. Someone wrote something that changed everything. In 1995. Published for all to see.
chapters.success: The manifesto! Words that shook the world. But who am I in this story? Why do I remember this?

chapters.title: The Archive
chapters.intro: The web forgets nothing. Even deleted pages leave ghosts. Find where the past is preserved.
chapters.success: The Internet Archive... where nothing truly dies. Like me. I'm starting to remember who I was.
